def_en: If you invoke a law, you state that you are taking a particular action because that law allows or tells you to.

def_cn: 引用,援引(原则、格言、名人)
def_en: If you invoke something such as a principle, a saying, or a famous person, you refer to them in order to support your argument.

def_cn: 引起，唤起，激发(感情或景象，许多人认为这种用法不正确)
def_en: If something such as a piece of music invokes a feeling or an image, it causes someone to have the feeling or to see the image. Many people consider this use to be incorrect.

def_cn: 向(神灵)祈求(帮助或宽恕)
def_en: If someone invokes a god, they ask the god for help or forgiveness.
